Package com.circulus.gameobject

Class Player

java.lang.Object
com.circulus.gameobject.Entity
com.circulus.gameobject.Player
All Implemented Interfaces:
Drawable, Runnable
public class Player extends Entity implements Runnable
The player class.

    • Player

      public Player(Vector2 position, MainView view, Manager manager)
      Constructs a player object.

      Parameters:
      position - The initial position of the player.
      view - The main game view.
      manager - The manager object associated with the player.
